title: No Loss Forgiven

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Just lost a game due to my whole team (all 5) disconnecting due to poor server connections. Didn't get any loss forgiven. Surely there should be some compensation for this...

Even the replay shows all 5 players disconnecting at exactly the same time...

Replay Webm Video:
https://giant.gfycat.com/SpitefulLoneAsiaticmouflon.webm

replies.body:
Loss Forgiven is only enabled during widespread outages/interruptions affecting a large majority of the playerbase.

Has this occurred since? Are you all using the same ISP? From the same general area?

I knew only the top laner, the rest of the team were randoms, additionally, I knew none of the enemy, who also had a disconnection. It only occurred on that one day where server connections were extremely poor. Unfortunately I don't think i will get a proper reply from any authority.
